glsa.title: Graphviz: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Graphviz and the extent of these vulnerabilities are unspecified.

background.p: Graphviz is an open source graph visualization software.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities in Graphviz were discovered. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker, able to control input matched against a regular expression or by enticing a user to process a specially crafted file, could cause unspecified impacts.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Graphviz users should upgrade to the latest version:
